evidence.claim: Silk Security, now under Armis, mentions integration with AWS and Azure for cloud services.
The company discusses compliance with HIPAA and HL7 standards in its security practices.
Armis outlines integration patterns applicable to healthcare systems, focusing on EHRs and interoperability protocols like HL7.

icp.icp_reason: No specific EDI/X12 use cases or relevant API automation evidence found.
